PDESubsystem¶

Contained here are the member functions for Fireframe's PDESubsystem class. The PDESubsystem class is responsible for collecting form args from the main PDESystem class and then producing the variational forms.

author : Keer Mei email: keer.mei18@imperial.ac.uk github username: kmei92

class acse.fireframe.PDESubsystem.PDESubsystem(solver_namespace, var_sequence)[source]¶

This class was adapted from Mikael Mortensen on July, 2019. Source code can be found here: https://bitbucket.org/simula_cbc/cbcpdesys/src/master/cbc/pdesys/PDESubSystems.py

Description: The PDESubsystem represents a single set of stand alone Partial Differential equations. This set of PDEs should be able to be solved without coupling to any other set of PDEs. For example, the Chorin projection scheme of the navier stokes equation.

Parameters:
  • solver_namespace (dictionary) -- a dictionary of all vars from the PDESystem object.
  • var_sequence (list) -- a list of the variables to be solved. i.e. ['u', 'p', 'u'] for the navier stokes equation
get_form(form_args, constants)[source]¶

This function was adapted from Mikael Mortensen on July, 2019. Source code can be found here: https://bitbucket.org/simula_cbc/cbcpdesys/src/master/cbc/pdesys/PDESubSystems.py

Description: For each variable in the var_seq, extract the variational form, the LHS and the RHS associated with the PDE responsible for solving that variable.

Params form_args:
 a dictionary of trial, test, and functions
Params constants:
 a dictionary of constants and firedrake parameters such as conditionals, coordinates, FacetNormals, etc...
query_args()[source]¶

This function was adapted from Mikael Mortensen on July, 2019. Source code can be found here: https://bitbucket.org/simula_cbc/cbcpdesys/src/master/cbc/pdesys/PDESubSystems.py

Description: Extracts the form_args that have been supplied by the system.

Returns self.form_args:
 a dictionary of all functions and Constants created from the PDESystem
Rtype self.form_args:
 dictionary
setup_base()[source]¶

Description: This function retrieves the form_args from the PDESystem and extracts the functions and trial functions from form)args
